Contact Us

The Northwestern Institute on Complex Systems (NICO)
Chambers Hall, 600 Foster Street
Evanston, Illinois 60208-4057 | Phone: 847-491-2527 | Email: nico@northwestern.edu

To contact specific NICO faculty and staff, please visit the people page.

NICO Listserv:

Subscribe to the NICO Listserv and receive information about the Wednesdays@NICO Speaker Series or other NICO related information.

To subscribe, send an email with only "SUBSCRIBE" in the subject line to nico@northwestern.edu.
To unsubscribe, send an email with only "UNSUBSCRIBE" in the subject line to nico@northwestern.edu.

You can also manage your listserve subscription via the NUIT Listserv web site.

Reading Group:

The NICO reading group meets regularly over lunch to discuss recent papers, fundamentals, and emerging trends in complexity research.

Social Media:

Connect with us on social Media to keep up with the latest news and events.

"Like" our Facebook page to add NICO news and events to your Facebook feed.
Follow us on Twitter for the latest news and events.
Join the NICO LinkedIn group page.
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel for the latest videos. We archive our speaker videos here.
